---
title: "R Packages"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

Here are some R packages I wrote.

* **[aqtr](https://github.com/emraher/aqtr)**: Download Air Quality Data for Turkey
* **[auobs](https://github.com/dijitallabmulkiye/auobs)**: Interface to Ankara University OBS 
* **[cbRt](https://github.com/emraher/cbRt)**: Interface to EDDS of CBRT 
* **[kgsr](https://github.com/emraher/kgsr)**: Download Data from KGS 
* **[rnass](https://github.com/emraher/rnass)**: Interface to NASS Database 
* **[tbat](https://github.com/emraher/tbat)**: Download Data From the Banks Association of Turkey 
* **[tuik](https://github.com/emraher/tuik)**: Download TUIK Data 
* **[turkeymap](https://github.com/emraher/turkeymap)**: Provides City and District Data for Turkey 

* [Farmland Values - Shiny App](https://github.com/emraher/Farmland_Values)
